title: The Shadow Isles Green is Ugly and Kallista Isn't
body:
First off, I hate the color of Kallista's/Thresh's/Karthus' abilities. It's ugly and distracting and I dislike how all of them are the sameish color, it can be difficult to distinguish in teamfights.

Secondly, why are all of the females from the land of undead monstrosities all attractive females? We have the male undead centaur, the male emaciated corpse, the male scarecrow, but all of the females look relatively human. Eve's just a hot chick with blue skin, Elise's human form is a hot chick in a halloween costume, and Kallista's a hot chick with weird skin and a weird hand. Why isn't she some sort of monster?
